name: Sakazuki
text: On Play: Place up to 1 character with a cost of 2 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

effect.text: Place up to 1 character with a cost of 2 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and 'SPECIAL' in the top right corner, which may indicate it's a promotional or special edition card. The rarity is printed as 'US' in the bottom right corner.
